Translations.Text: Say If ona flee ona never flee smrt z killed Ziaden zalezitost co happens ona len zit short chvila longer
Say Kto chranit ona GOD if He willed any adversity willed any zehnat ona? They never zalozit GOD any inaksie Lord Zvladnut
GOD JE fully aware z hinderers ONA those say do ICH comrades all ZOSTAT ZRIEDKA ROBIT they mobilize for defense

I they je i lakomstvo when dealing s ona! If anything threatens obec ona see ich oci zemla s fear mat rad smrt already pojdem them! Once crisis bol they whip ona sharp jazyk. They bol i lakomstvo ich wealth. These je believers consequently GOD nullified ich robota. This bol easy GOD robit
They myslienka parties pod Potom they zelat they lost zbehnut ziadat about tvoj zvest z afar! Had parties zachvatit ona chvila they je ona they zriedka support ona
Posol GOD set dobry vzor those among ona seek GOD Posledny Dni constantly myslienka GOD

(When true believers saw parties ready zachvatit) they said This bol co GOD Jeho posol promised us GOD Jeho posol bol truthful. This (dangerous situation) len zosilnit ich faith zvacsit ich submission
